Question: In 2002, scholar Molefi Kete Asante included this person on his list of 100 Greatest African Americans.
Hints: According to police reports, this person refused to stop blocking the front entrance of the store and let customers pass.
This person later criticized Obama in 2007 for "acting like he's white," in response to the Jena 6 beating case.
Subsequent to his Fox News interview, this person apologized and reiterated his support for Obama.
